verses.verse: Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> he to the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> It is impossible <S%G418><s%> but that offenses <S%G4625><s%> will come: <S%G2064><s%> but woe <S%G3759><s%> to him, through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> they come! <S%G2064><s%>

It were better <S%G3081><s%> for him that a millstone <S%G3458><s%> <S%G3684><s%> were hanged <S%G4029><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> his neck, <S%G5137><s%> and he cast <S%G4496><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> that he should offend <S%G4624><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> little <S%G3398><s%> ones.

Take heed <S%G4337><s%> to yourselves: <S%G1438><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> your brother <S%G80><s%> trespass <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> you, rebuke <S%G2008><s%> him; and if <S%G1437><s%> he repent, <S%G3340><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> him.

And if <S%G1437><s%> he trespass <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> you seven <S%G2034><s%> times <S%G2034><s%> in a day, <S%G2250><s%> and seven <S%G2034><s%> times <S%G2034><s%> in a day <S%G2250><s%> turn <S%G1994><s%> again <S%G1994><s%> to you, saying, <S%G3004><s%> I repent; <S%G3340><s%> you shall forgive <S%G863><s%> him.
And the apostles <S%G652><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Increase <S%G4369><s%> our faith. <S%G4102><s%>

And the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> you had <S%G2192><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> as a grain <S%G2848><s%> of mustard <S%G4615><s%> seed, you might say <S%G3004><s%> to this <S%G5026><s%> sycamine <S%G4807><s%> tree, Be you plucked <S%G1610><s%> up by the root, <S%G1610><s%> and be you planted <S%G5452><s%> in the sea; <S%G2281><s%> and it should obey <S%G5219><s%> you.

But which <S%G5101><s%> of you, having <S%G2192><s%> a servant <S%G1401><s%> plowing <S%G722><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> feeding <S%G4165><s%> cattle, <S%G4165><s%> will say <S%G2046><s%> to him by and by, when he is come <S%G1525><s%> from the field, <S%G68><s%> Go <S%G3928><s%> and sit <S%G377><s%> down <S%G377><s%> to meat?

And will not rather say <S%G2046><s%> to him, Make <S%G2090><s%> ready <S%G2090><s%> with which <S%G5101><s%> I may sup, <S%G1172><s%> and gird <S%G4024><s%> yourself, and serve <S%G1247><s%> me, till <S%G2193><s%> I have eaten <S%G5315><s%> and drunken; <S%G4095><s%> and afterward <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%> you shall eat <S%G5315><s%> and drink? <S%G4095><s%>
Does he thank <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5485><s%> that servant <S%G1401><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he did <S%G4160><s%> the things that were commanded <S%G1299><s%> him? I trow <S%G1380><s%> not.

So <S%G3779><s%> likewise <S%G2532><s%> you, when <S%G3752><s%> you shall have done <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> things which are commanded <S%G1299><s%> you, say, <S%G3004><s%> We are unprofitable <S%G888><s%> servants: <S%G1401><s%> we have done <S%G4160><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> was our duty <S%G3784><s%> to do. <S%G4160><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, as he went <S%G4198><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> that he passed <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the middle <S%G3319><s%> of Samaria <S%G4540><s%> and Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

And as he entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> village, <S%G2968><s%> there met <S%G528><s%> him ten <S%G1176><s%> men <S%G435><s%> that were lepers, <S%G3015><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> afar <S%G4207><s%> off:
And they lifted <S%G142><s%> up their voices, <S%G5456><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Master, <S%G1988><s%> have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on us.

And when he saw <S%G1492><s%> them, he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Go <S%G4198><s%> show <S%G1925><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> to the priests. <S%G2409><s%> And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that, as they went, <S%G5217><s%> they were cleansed. <S%G2511><s%>

And one <S%G1520><s%> of them, when he saw <S%G1492><s%> that he was healed, <S%G2390><s%> turned <S%G5290><s%> back, <S%G5290><s%> and with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>
And fell <S%G4098><s%> down on <S%G1909><s%> his face <S%G4383><s%> at <S%G3844><s%> his feet, <S%G4228><s%> giving him thanks: <S%G2168><s%> and he was a Samaritan. <S%G4541><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Were there not ten <S%G1176><s%> cleansed? <S%G2511><s%> but where <S%G4226><s%> are the nine? <S%G1767><s%>
There are not found <S%G2147><s%> that returned <S%G5290><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> save <S%G1508><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> stranger. <S%G241><s%>
And he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Arise, <S%G450><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> your way: your faith <S%G4102><s%> has made <S%G4982><s%> you whole. <S%G4982><s%>

And when he was demanded <S%G1905><s%> of the Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> when <S%G4218><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> should come, <S%G2064><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> them and said, <S%G2036><s%> The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> not with observation: <S%G3907><s%>

Neither <S%G3761><s%> shall they say, <S%G2046><s%> See <S%G2400><s%> here! <S%G5602><s%> or, <S%G2228><s%> see <S%G2400><s%> there! <S%G1563><s%> for, behold, <S%G2400><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is within <S%G1787><s%> you.

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> The days <S%G2250><s%> will come, <S%G2064><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> you shall desire <S%G1937><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> of the days <S%G2250><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> and you shall not see <S%G3700><s%> it.

And they shall say <S%G2046><s%> to you, See <S%G2400><s%> here; <S%G5602><s%> or, <S%G2228><s%> see <S%G2400><s%> there: <S%G1563><s%> go <S%G565><s%> not after them, nor <S%G3364><s%> follow <S%G1377><s%> them.

For as the lightning, <S%G796><s%> that lightens <S%G797><s%> out of the one part under <S%G5259><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> shines <S%G2989><s%> to the other part under <S%G5259><s%> heaven; <S%G3772><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> shall also <S%G2532><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> be in his day. <S%G2250><s%>
But first <S%G4412><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> he suffer <S%G3958><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things, and be rejected <S%G593><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>
And as it was in the days <S%G2250><s%> of Noe, <S%G3575><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> shall it be also <S%G2532><s%> in the days <S%G2250><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man. <S%G444><s%>

They did eat, <S%G2068><s%> they drank, <S%G4095><s%> they married <S%G1060><s%> wives, they were given in marriage, <S%G1548><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> that Noe <S%G3575><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ark, <S%G2787><s%> and the flood <S%G2627><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> and destroyed <S%G622><s%> them all. <S%G537><s%>

Likewise <S%G3668><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> as it was in the days <S%G2250><s%> of Lot; <S%G3091><s%> they did eat, <S%G2068><s%> they drank, <S%G4095><s%> they bought, <S%G59><s%> they sold, <S%G4453><s%> they planted, <S%G5452><s%> they built; <S%G3618><s%>

But the same day <S%G2250><s%> that Lot <S%G3091><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out of Sodom <S%G4670><s%> it rained <S%G1026><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> and brimstone <S%G2303><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and destroyed <S%G622><s%> them all. <S%G537><s%>
Even thus <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5023><s%> shall it be in the day <S%G2250><s%> when the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is revealed. <S%G601><s%>

In that day, <S%G2250><s%> he which <S%G3739><s%> shall be on the housetop, <S%G1430><s%> and his stuff <S%G4632><s%> in the house, <S%G3614><s%> let him not come <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> to take <S%G142><s%> it away: and he that is in the field, <S%G68><s%> let him likewise <S%G3668><s%> not return <S%G1994><s%> back. <S%G3694><s%>
Remember <S%G3421><s%> Lot's wife. <S%G1135><s%>

Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall seek <S%G2212><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> it; and whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> shall preserve <S%G2225><s%> it.

I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, in that night <S%G3571><s%> there shall be two <S%G1417><s%> men in one <S%G3391><s%> bed; <S%G2825><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%> shall be taken, <S%G3880><s%> and the other <S%G2087><s%> shall be left. <S%G863><s%>

Two <S%G1417><s%> women shall be grinding <S%G229><s%> together; <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%> the one <S%G3391><s%> shall be taken, <S%G3880><s%> and the other <S%G2087><s%> left. <S%G863><s%>
Two <S%G1417><s%> men shall be in the field; <S%G68><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%> shall be taken, <S%G3880><s%> and the other <S%G2087><s%> left. <S%G863><s%>

And they answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Where, <S%G4226><s%> Lord? <S%G2962><s%> And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Wherever <S%G3699><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> is, thither <S%G1563><s%> will the eagles <S%G105><s%> be gathered <S%G4863><s%> together. <S%G4863><s%>
